</defines>

<module_info>
name -> "libsodium API"
brief -> "Partial compatibility implementation of the libsodium API"
</module_info>

salsa20
poly1305
chacha20poly1305

ed25519

sha2_64
hmac
siphash
system_rng
</requires>

</header:public>
